Text: Net Works Structure Chartis a revised structure chart for the Net Works equity fund The chart represents the comments and issues raised at last weeks structuring meeting
Net Works Structure Chartis a revised structure chart for the Net Works equity fund The chart represents the comments and issues raised at last weeks structuring meeting

FW Dialin for pm call Cc Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November PM To Dorsey Joyce Cc PeterFinleychase Subject Dialin for pm call The dial in number for the EnronBain call scheduled for tomorrow at pm is participant code

Your NYC schedule wlocations Cc Monday November pm pm CSFB Park Avenue th Floor Room B Mike Ranger pm pm Apollo Advisors Avenue of the Americas th Floor Michael Gross Rob Katz pm pm JPMorgan Partners Avenue of the Americas th Floor Christopher Behrens Tuesday November am am KKR West th Street nd Floor Scott Stuart am pm Blackstone Park Avenue st Floor Howie Lipson David Stonehill pm pm AIG Highstar Capital LLC Park Avenue th Floor Room A Chris Lee Michael Walsh Brad Schwab Aaron Gold pm pm Bain Capital Conference Call Steve Zide Joyce Dorsey Enron Corp Corporate Development

Todays schedule changePer Angie in Sperrys office AIG has changed schedule You will now be meeting w premeeting at address below pm CSFB JPMorganChase Bldg Park Ave th Floor Rm B Contact is Claudia th flr receptionist if you have trouble wsecurity Apollo JPM Partners their building address to follow as soon as received

FW AIR AND HOTEL FOR ROD HAYSLETTRod Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Joyce x Original Message From Ginny Torstrick mailto Sent Friday November PM To Dorsey Joyce Subject AIR AND HOTEL FOR ROD HAYSLETT AGENT GTGT BOOKING REF YMBXQ HAYSLETTROD EB ETKT RECEIPT DATE NOV SERVICE DATE FROM TO DEPART ARRIVE CONTINENTAL AIRLINES NOV HOUSTON TX NEWARK NJ A A CO Y MON GBUSH INTERCO NEWARK INTL TERMINAL C TERMINAL C SNACK NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT A NO SMOKING CONFIRMED HAYSLETTRODID THIS IS AN ADVANCE PURCHASE REFUNDABLE FARE CHANGES MAY RESULT IN AN ADDITIONAL COLLECTION HOTEL NOV W NEW YORK UNION SQUARE NOV PARK AVENUE SOUTH NEW YORK NY UNITED STATES OF AMERICA TELEPHONE FAX TELEX NONE CONFIRMATION SINGLE ROOM KING SIZE BED RATE COR USD PER NIGHT GUARANTEE GIVEN NONSMK KING ROOM TO AVOID BILLING CANCEL HRS PRIOR TO ARRIVAL CONTINENTAL AIRLINES NOV NEW YORK NY HOUSTON TX P P CO Y TUE LA GUARDIA GBUSH INTERCO TERMINAL M TERMINAL C SNACK NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT E NO SMOKING CONFIRMED HAYSLETTRODID RESERVATION NUMBERS COUKLE HAYSLETTROD SCR CO FREQUENT FLYER COBS ASSISTANT KATHY CAMPOS NEW FAA REQUIREMENTS CHECK IN AT LEAST HOURS PRIOR TO FLIGHT DEPARTURE FOR DOMESTIC HOURS FOR INTERNATIONAL TO GO THROUGH SECURITY YOU ARE REQUIRED TO HAVE AN ITINERARY GENERATED BY AN AIRLINE OR TRAVEL AGENCY CONFIRMING AN ELECTRONIC TICKET INCLUDING TICKET NUMBER OR A RECEIPT FOR AN ELECTRONIC TICKET INCLUDING TICKET NUMBER ANDOR A BOARDING PASS FOR THE CURRENT DAY THIS IS THE PASSENGER RECEIPT FOR YOUR ELECTRONIC TICKET PLEASE CHECKIN WITH PHOTO IDENTIFICATION AND WITH EITHER THIS RECEIPT OR YOUR CONFIRMATION NUMBER OUR ETKT CONFIRMATION NUMBER IS UKPRP SEATS ARE AWFULLTRY TO GET BETTER ONES BUT FLIGHTS ARE FULL

Net Works Structure Chartis a revised structure chart for the Net Works equity fund The chart represents the comments and issues raised at last weeks structuring meeting

Net Works Partnership Agreementis the initial draft of the partnership agreement for Enron Net Works Partners LP In light of the accelerated schedule to close the Net Works equity fund please forward your comments to me at your earliest convenience

Revised Term Sheet Draft Cc a revised draft of the term sheet for the equity Funding of Enron Net Works Partners LP The draft has been circulated to potential third party investors and comments are anticipated this week
